name: Yum Collector
description:
Yum collector - Deciding to change your life dramatically, you take care of a little dog from a shelter, but bad luck - he is constantly very hungry! Tidy up your kitchen by matching identical treats together to feed your ravenous pet in this quirky version of the mahjong connect game. Connect and remove pairs, use hints and shuffling the playing field if the combinations are over and save the dog from hunger!


Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack
